name: Ancient Empires Reloaded
description:
This Ancient Empires Reloaded, a remastered version of the old Ancient Empries Series. Development of this game was started in early 2016, simply for the love of this game and wanted to bring it back to life. As a fan-made game, it's 100% F2P, no ads or micro transactions embedded. If you are a fan of turn-based strategy game with pixel looking, you definitely should give it try :)
How To Play
Android Phone/Pad Users:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.toyknight.aeii.android
iPhone/iPad Users:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1202568287
Features
Completely rewritten battle systemOriginal & newly added campaignsCampaign leaderboard with watchable replaysIn-game map editor to create your custom skirmish gamesOnline map sharing centerOnline multiplayer mode
Credits & Notes
This game is using my handcrafted battle system engine built on top of libgdx, so if you like this game and want to give it a new look, feel free to contact me @lp_gong.
